name: Save her, from dreams
description: Enter the dream, save the one you love.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista SP1+, 64 bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Headphone recommended
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
